estudios-titulo.udemy:
React from zero to expert
(Mern and HOOKS)

proyectos-list.canuto:
• Authentication and management of user sessions.
  • Analysis, design and implementation of a database system using Sequelize (ORM).
  • Integration with other platforms through apis ( Instagram Api).
  • Use of Session and Cookies for information storage.
  • Implementation of search systems, filtering and saving of products
proyectos-list.ginger:
• Authentication and management of user sessions.
  • Analysis, design and implementation of a database system using Sequelize (ORM).
  • Integration with other platforms through apis ( Instagram Api).
  • Use of Session and Cookies for information storage.
  • Implementation of search systems, filtering and saving of products
proyectos-list.tpo:
• Api creation using Python, Flask and decorators
  • Database creation using Sqlite3
  • CRUD(create, read, update and delete) implemented using vue and Javascript in the front calling the endpoints of the created api
  • Using Parallax for the background

proyectos-tec.ginger: Technologies: Nodejs, Javascript, Mysql, Sequelize, Express , Bootstrap.
proyectos-tec.tpo: Technologies: Python, Flask, Vue, Javascript, Sqlite3, Bootstrap, Parallax.
